title: ログインシステム
uml:
@startuml
participant User
participant System
participant Database

User -> System: ログイン
System -> Database: ユーザー認証
Database --> System: 認証成功
System --> User: ログイン成功メッセージ

User -> System: メッセージ送信
System -> Database: メッセージ保存
Database --> System: メッセージ保存完了
System --> User: 送信成功メッセージ

User -> System: ログアウト
System -> Database: ログアウト処理
Database --> System: ログアウト処理完了
System --> User: ログアウト成功メッセージ
@enduml

title: オンラインサイトでの注文のプロセス
uml:
@startuml
actor Customer
participant WebApp
participant PaymentGateway
participant OrderSystem
participant InventorySystem
participant ShippingSystem

Customer -> WebApp: 商品を選択
Customer -> WebApp: カートに追加
Customer -> WebApp: 注文を確定

WebApp -> Customer: 注文詳細を表示
WebApp -> PaymentGateway: 支払い情報を送信
WebApp -> OrderSystem: 注文を登録
OrderSystem -> InventorySystem: 在庫を確認
InventorySystem --> OrderSystem: 在庫情報を提供
OrderSystem -> ShippingSystem: 出荷指示を送信
ShippingSystem --> OrderSystem: 出荷情報を提供
OrderSystem --> PaymentGateway: 支払いを確定
PaymentGateway --> WebApp: 支払い承認
WebApp -> Customer: 注文確認メッセージを表示

WebApp -> Customer: ログアウト
@enduml

title: 電子メール送信のプロセス
uml:
@startuml
actor Customer
participant EmailClient
participant MailServer
actor Recipient

Customer -> EmailClient: 電子メールを作成
EmailClient -> EmailClient: メールの作成と編集
EmailClient -> MailServer: メールを送信
MailServer -> MailServer: メールの受信と転送
MailServer -> Recipient: メールを受信
Recipient --> MailServer: 受信確認

Customer -> EmailClient: ログアウト
@enduml

title: ブログプラットフォーム
uml:
@startuml
left to right direction

actor User as U
actor Blogger as B
actor Admin as A
actor System as S

rectangle BloggingPlatform {
  U -- (Browse Blogs)
  U -- (Read Blog)
  U -- (Comment on Blog)

  B -- (Create Blog)
  B -- (Edit Blog)
  B -- (Delete Blog)
  B -- (Manage Comments)

  A -- (Manage Blogs)
  A -- (Manage Users)

  S -- (Notify Users)
}

U --> (Login)
U --> (Logout)
U --> (Register)

B --> (Login)
B --> (Logout)
B --> (Create Post)
B --> (Edit Post)
B --> (Delete Post)
B --> (Manage Profile)

A --> (Login)
A --> (Logout)
A --> (Manage System)
@enduml

title: 航空予約システム
uml:
@startuml
left to right direction

actor Customer as C
actor Administrator as Admin
actor AirlineStaff as Staff
actor System as S

rectangle FlightReservationSystem {
  C -- (Search Flights)
  C -- (View Flight Details)
  C -- (Book Flight)
  C -- (Cancel Reservation)
  C -- (View Reservation)

  Admin -- (Manage Users)
  Admin -- (Manage Flights)
  Admin -- (Generate Reports)

  Staff -- (Check-in Passengers)
  Staff -- (Manage Flights)
  Staff -- (Manage Reservations)
  Staff -- (Process Payments)

  S -- (Notify Customers)
}

C --> (Register)
C --> (Login)
C --> (Logout)

Admin --> (Login)
Admin --> (Logout)
Admin --> (Manage System)

Staff --> (Login)
Staff --> (Logout)

C --> (Receive Confirmation Email)
C --> (Receive Boarding Pass)

Staff --> (Issue Boarding Pass)

C --> (Receive Cancellation Confirmation)
@enduml

title: 図書館管理システム
uml:
@startuml
left to right direction

actor LibraryUser as User
actor LibraryStaff as Staff
actor System as S

rectangle LibraryManagementSystem {
  User -- (Search Books)
  User -- (View Book Details)
  User -- (Check Out Book)
  User -- (Return Book)
  User -- (Renew Book)
  User -- (View Due Dates)
  User -- (Place Hold)
  User -- (Pay Fine)

  Staff -- (Add Book)
  Staff -- (Remove Book)
  Staff -- (Manage User Accounts)
  Staff -- (Manage Loans)
  Staff -- (Generate Reports)

  S -- (Notify Overdue Users)
}

User --> (Login)
User --> (Logout)
User --> (Register)

Staff --> (Login)
Staff --> (Logout)
Staff --> (Manage System)

User --> (Receive Due Date Reminder)
User --> (Receive Hold Pickup Notice)

Staff --> (Issue Library Card)

User --> (Receive Hold Available Notification)

User --> (Receive Fine Notice)

User --> (Receive Renewal Confirmation)
@enduml
